Claim: "A woman with red-hair staples some papers."
Implication: "A red-haired woman is working on the computer."
Referring expressions: Woman, red-hair, staples, papers  Red-haired woman, computer
Formula: (exists c (exists b (IsRedHaired(b) and StaplesPapers(c))) & (forall h (forall g (  IsWorkingOnComputer(g) ->  IsRedHaired(h))))) -> (exists e (IsRedHaired(e) and IsWorkingOnComputer(e)))
